name: invisible-dex
description: Hybrid prediction market platform - Sui + Yellow Network for high-frequency micro-betting

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: npx concurrently --names "server,frontend" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend"
